item.title: LIVE TV Restored
item.description: Live TV service for channels 18 to 46 was restored this morning.

item.title: Recent server failure
item.description: The server problems yesterday have been fixed and Japanese VISION channels up to channel 17 are now viewable. We are working on restoring all other channels. We apologize for this inconvenience.

item.title: Channel outage
item.description: We are presently experiencing a problem with a number of channels. We request your patience while we investigate this problem.

item.title: Store hours change
item.description: Store hours have changed to Mon-Sun 9:00am~5:00pm.

item.title: Store hours change
item.description: Beginning January the store hours will be Mon-Fri 10:00am~4:00pm.

item.title: J-Service Hilton has opened!!
item.description: J-Service Marriott now has a sister store in Hilton Hawaiian Village! As with the Marriott location, this store serves tourists and customers wishing to rent for periods of less than six months. Please introduce it to your friends staying in Hawaii short-term. less_thandiv class='news-indented'greater_than J-Service less_thanbrgreater_than Hilton Hawaiian Village less_thanbrgreater_than ALIâ€™I TOWER SUITE A less_thanbrgreater_than Tel: 808-451-9739 less_thanbrgreater_than E-mail: less_thana href="mailto:infohilton@j-service.org"greater_thaninfohilton@j-service.orgless_than/agreater_than less_than/divgreater_than

item.title: KAUKAU Campaign
item.description: The first 20 customers appying from KAUKAU WEB / KAUKAU Magazine to rent for at least 3 days get the first day of rental free (normally $5) and a gift of Hawaiian honey!

item.title: KAUKAU coupon
item.description: Until April 14, receive a KAUKAU coupon for a free souvenir when renting a willfon for 2 or more days!
